product_name: Nathan QuickShot Plus Handheld Gel/Water Bottle
long_description: The Nathan QuickShot Plus Handheld gel/water bottle keeps a quick shot of hydration or energy at the ready when you're training or racing. 10 fl. oz. flask with race cap holds water or energy gel; flask is BPA-free and dishwasher safe. Adjustable handstrap with thumbhole keeps flask in place so you don't have to grip it. The Nathan QuickShot Plus Handheld gel/water bottle features an expandable zippered pocket to hold small essentials.
short_description: The Nathan QuickShot Plus Handheld gel/water bottle keeps a quick shot of hydration or energy at the ready when you're training or racing.
